Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Unanswered \Un*an"swered\, a. 1. Not answered; not replied; as, an unanswered letter. [1913 Webster]
2. Not refuted; as, an unanswered argument. [1913 Webster]
3. Not responded to in kind; unrequited; as, unanswered affection. [1913 Webster]
unanswered adj : not returned in kind; "unrequited (unanswered) love" [syn: {unreciprocated}, {unrequited}]
